promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute simple owl electric-type wearing a ancient crystal headband. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or electric. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystalus, a chibi cute simple owl electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: ion-deluge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word owl or electric or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, owl-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This shy Pokemon hides in mountain crevices, using Ion-Deluge to awaken the night with flashes of electricity.
